Assessments are due the Friday following a weeks lecture and tutorial.  

During lab time, you will have the opportunity for help you with your problem sets. 


# Assessment Schedule

## Week 1

1. Following the course and lab instructions, download git and Github. Choose a username that will be OK for professional purposes. Set yourseful up with an account, and create your first repository.


2.  Follow the lecture instructions and download R and R-Studio. 

- Create a GitHub project in Rstudio
- Create your first Rmarkdown document, and title it "My Journal" 
- Record your impressions of the process of getting set up with RStudio and GitHub
- Record any help you have offered to other people, and any help you have sought from other people, along the way. 
- Save the document and commit it to GitHub.
